metadata.name: Kundalini Art #1 Special Edition
metadata.description:
Kundalini Art #1  
Special Edition  

This image represents a symbolic meaning of our first spiritual project Kundalini Art, brought to you by all the unique artists involved under the name ASTRAL-NFTS  – Awakening Spiritual Transcendental Rejuvenating Art League NFTS. 

Kundalini energy initially refers to the sleeping serpent in every human, which could be awakened for spiritual enlightenment.  
Those who practice kundalini yoga after awakening say it results in deep meditation, gaining of knowledge, and also physical and mental bliss. There are several ways to awaken one’s kundalini energy. Most of them are meditation, pranayama, asanas, mantras and slokas.  
Kundalini awakening accesses the inner energy that lies unused in us and helps us realize the nature of God, the world around us, and our connection to the planet Earth and the Universe.  

The collaboration Abracollabra consists of many artists, musicians, photographers, and developers:  
sAMOyART, Joe Francis, Rogue Oasis, IvyNelsewhere, Treelana, SeeArt, Isola, Katherine Buglione, Mr.Pepper, iTatchero.eth, MAHINTH, bvrts_  
We have come together to shape the ASTRAL-NFTS – Awakening Spiritual Transcendental Rejuvenating Art League -NFTS. 
Our Abracollabra creative process is manifesting awakening and spiritual transformation which comes with the power of recognition and activating Kundalini energy.  
Within the power of this collection, we are raising awareness of Higher Consciousness, Spiritual Being in humanity on our planet and Feeling the One!  
The initial collection will consist of 108 1/1 unique authentic hand-painted and digitally retouched arts in the collaborative realm of Abracollabra.

Utility:  
1.	 The image can be used as a print.  
File: PNG RGB 5000x5155px 21.5MB.  
2.  We can provide a spiritual session with our ASTRAL-NFTS team, where we can share our wisdom and vision of the spiritual transformation we are going through and the goals we are trying to achieve on that path of enlightenment.
